title: Logging on Issue
body:
Hi!

I cant login into the game today (EUNE server).

It goes through the credentials check and then freezes for 15 secs on the "Logging on" pop-up. And then there is an error message linking me to Riot's support. I've done everything what is there, but it doesn't help.

If I use the TunnelBear software I can log in, but this is not the best solution, as I don't want to have any 3rd party software to help me with logging in.

The network analysis can be found here: 
http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=369839a0-14344-500e980d-dcb0-4270-97ba

replies.body: Thanks for running a network analysis!  For your specific issue, please attach this in a[ player support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to our tech team, and we can look into this for you.
